channel.title: GenocidePk - Pking Server
channel.description:
[CENTER][B]Welcome to GenocidePk - Spawn Server's Advertisement Page[/B]
[B]Temporary Forums:[/B] [url=http://genocidepk.forumotion.com/]GenocidePk Forums[/url] [B]Play the Beta:[/B] [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/v6o9laki0jcoe25/GenocidePk.jar?]GenocidePk BetaServer Mirror[/url] [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/v6o9laki0jcoe25/GenocidePk.jar?dl=0]GenocidePk BetaServer[/url]
[B]Game Media might not look good, but if you try it. I'm sure you'll find it enjoyable to play. I'm still learning guys, cmon! Pking is really good. It's actually great. Bonuses on items, delays, autocasting with magick, you name it.[/B]
[B]About us:[/B] As of right now, we are in Beta Testing and trying to desperately get a full on VPS, auto donation system, voting site, and of course a Forums! GenocidePk is a new RSPS created by Paradox. The server is based on Instantly Pking and having a good time doing it. For now the server is in Beta. The server still needs a little testing, but we're getting there. We currently don't have a Website for now until somewhere in the Weekend or Monday, 9/29/2014. In GenocidePk you will log in and Instantly have items waiting for you in your bank ready to Pk. There is also a Spawn Tab for people who just want to grab some gear and Pk or you can select an InstaEquip Tab. Training is not needed in this server, you will be set automatically to combat level 126. You will have the option to change your stats if you wish. For those who enjoy the skilling in a private server, most skills have been reworked to to benifit your desires.
[B]What features we have so far are:[/B] -Server Statius: ONLINE! -Beta Test Mode ATM! -Great Owner that has played many RSPS throughout his years -Gameframe switches, hitmarks, old/new hp bar,etc. -Sceenshots by pressing f12 for quick screenies -Player Titles! -Change Cursors! -Zoom in and out! -Low/High details! -Snowing interface + Snows on ground! -Change Fgos -Special Restore Potions, Void Armours -Operate option to chck anims w/gfx special on an item! -Focoses on PKing,Staking, an possibly Gambling! -Skilling is also an option for Completionist Cape -You can even Customize the colors for it! -Great Hybriding w/ Autocasting -Small Cache! -Curses, but still need a bit progress and no gfx/anims leeches -Vengeance works -Fun KillStreak System Re-written -FunPk, atm disabled -Autolose(if you're skulled) and Autokeep! -Re Skull will disable your protect item for Risk Fights! -PvP, Donator, and Vote Shop! -Clean efficient efficient commands list! -Ability to set your combat stats ::atk 50, ::hp 99, ::def 1, etc. -Bank tabs + Bank pins! -No lag, unless you find me bugs to fix, I love bugs. Not literal though! -Instantly Pk with Phr33 items from the spawn tab and your bank! -Bank setup for pk'ing as soon as you log in! -EP with Rewards System! -Colored whips, SOL, and Infinity Mage Armours! -Fully working Spirit Shields effects! -Chaotics with charges, Dragon claws, and Dragon Defender! -All PvP armours/weapons that vanishes throughout time of use! -And so much more because I cba.
[B]I'll be editing the Advertisement, throughout this week and next week. Still in the process learning to advertise. Yes, I have NEVER advertised on a Forums before.[/B]
[spoiler=Media] [IMG]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/1060x700q90/909/aIOrIw.png[/img][IMG]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/1060x700q90/661/KSq3YE.png[/img] [IMG]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/1060x700q90/912/CD43mc.png[/img] [IMG]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/1060x700q90/901/kwCA8B.png[/img] [IMG]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/1060x700q90/911/Q4fJ7M.png[/img] [IMG]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/1060x700q90/910/nVQNnE.png[/img] [IMG]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/1060x700q90/538/5TiNZL.png[/img] [IMG]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/1060x700q90/912/axWRyS.png[/img] [IMG]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/1060x700q90/537/s2hNmh.png[/img] [IMG]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/1060x700q90/633/x50YCy.png[/img][IMG]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/1060x7000q90/743/PHIRTG.png[/img] [IMG]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/1060x700q90/673/eI2QzE.png[/img] [IMG]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/1060x700q90/904/fxctVq.png[/img] [IMG]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/1060x700q90/905/ISQBQy.png[/img] [IMG]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/1060x700q90/908/AhzELG.png[/img] [IMG]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/1060x700q90/912/tG8niF.png[/img] [IMG]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/1060x700q90/742/VDgGZp.png[/img] [IMG]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/1060x700q90/912/6EiY9R.png[/img][/spoiler] [/CENTER]

item.title: GenocidePk - Pking Server
item.dc:creator: @i_vote_for_genocidep i vote for genocidepk
item.description:
@i_vote_for_genocidep wrote:

Great server man! Media might not look so good. But pking is really awesome! Hope there’s more players in here other than 11, but it’s ok not even 1 week out !!!

Read full topic

item.title: GenocidePk - Pking Server
item.dc:creator: @imback4more imback4more
item.description:
@imback4more wrote:

[CENTER][B]Welcome to GenocidePk - Spawn Server’s Advertisement Page[/B]

[B]Temporary Forums:[/B]
GenocidePk Forums
[B]Play the Beta:[/B]
GenocidePk BetaServer Mirror
GenocidePk BetaServer

[B]Game Media might not look good, but if you try it. I’m sure you’ll find it enjoyable to play. I’m still learning guys, cmon!
Pking is really good. It’s actually great. Bonuses on items, delays, autocasting with magick, you name it.[/B]

[B]About us:[/B]
As of right now, we are in Beta Testing and trying to desperately get a full on VPS,
auto donation system, voting site, and of course a Forums!
GenocidePk is a new RSPS created by Paradox. The server is based on Instantly Pking and having a good time doing it.
For now the server is in Beta. The server still needs a little testing, but we’re getting there.
We currently don’t have a Website for now until somewhere in the Weekend or Monday, 9/29/2014.
In GenocidePk you will log in and Instantly have items waiting for you in your bank ready to Pk.
There is also a Spawn Tab for people who just want to grab some gear and Pk or you can select an InstaEquip Tab.
Training is not needed in this server, you will be set automatically to combat level 126.
You will have the option to change your stats if you wish. For those who enjoy the skilling in a private server,
most skills have been reworked to to benifit your desires.

[B]What features we have so far are:[/B]
-Server Statius: ONLINE!
-Beta Test Mode ATM!
-Great Owner that has played many RSPS throughout his years
-Gameframe switches, hitmarks, old/new hp bar,etc.
-Sceenshots by pressing f12 for quick screenies
-Player Titles!
-Change Cursors!
-Zoom in and out!
-Low/High details!
-Snowing interface + Snows on ground!
-Change Fgos
-Special Restore Potions, Void Armours
-Operate option to chck anims w/gfx special on an item!
-Focoses on PKing,Staking, an possibly Gambling!
-Skilling is also an option for Completionist Cape
-You can even Customize the colors for it!
-Great Hybriding w/ Autocasting
-Small Cache!
-Curses, but still need a bit progress and no gfx/anims leeches
-Vengeance works
-Fun KillStreak System Re-written
-FunPk, atm disabled
-Autolose(if you’re skulled) and Autokeep!
-Re Skull will disable your protect item for Risk Fights!
-PvP, Donator, and Vote Shop!
-Clean efficient efficient commands list!
-Ability to set your combat stats ::atk 50, ::hp 99, ::def 1, etc.
-Bank tabs + Bank pins!
-No lag, unless you find me bugs to fix, I love bugs. Not literal though!
-Instantly Pk with Phr33 items from the spawn tab and your bank!
-Bank setup for pk’ing as soon as you log in!
-EP with Rewards System!
-Colored whips, SOL, and Infinity Mage Armours!
-Fully working Spirit Shields effects!
-Chaotics with charges, Dragon claws, and Dragon Defender!
-All PvP armours/weapons that vanishes throughout time of use!
-And so much more because I cba.

[B]I’ll be editing the Advertisement, throughout this week and next week.
Still in the process learning to advertise. Yes, I have NEVER advertised on a Forums before.[/B]

[spoiler=Media]















[/spoiler]
[/CENTER]
